title: Celine Dion shares rare snap of her twin sons Nelson and Eddy on their ninth birthday
text:
She's mother to three boys.

And Celine Dion wished two of her sons a happy birthday on Wednesday, in a rare family snap shared to Instagram.

In the heartfelt caption, the 51-year-old songstress wrote, 'Double the laughter and double the love. Happy 9th Birthday, Nelson and Eddy!'

Her boys: Celine Dion wished two of her sons a happy birthday on Wednesday, in a rare family snap shared to Instagram. Nelson and Eddy pictured here

The My Heart Will Go On hitmaker continued, 'I’m so very proud of my boys. I love you! —Mom xx…'

Nelson and Eddy smiled sweetly in the first photo, while in a second pic they pulled amusing faces for the camera.

As well as the twins, Dion also shares an 18-year-old son, René-Charles, with her late husband René Angélil, who passed away in 2016.

Mugging for the camera: In the heartfelt caption, the 51-year-old songstress wrote, 'Double the laughter and double the love. Happy 9th Birthday, Nelson and Eddy!'

As well as the twins, Dion also shares an 18-year-old son, René-Charles [far right], with her late husband René Angélil [2R], who passed away in 2016

Celine's social media drop come just weeks before the release of her upcoming album, Courage.

Courage will be Dion's first English-language studio album in six years.

According to a press release from Columbia Records, Courage is 'a mix of beautiful ballads and edgy uptempo tracks.'

And all 16 songs on the album will stand for 'an exciting new creative direction' for Dion.

The songstress teased the album on Sept 18 when she released three of its songs: Imperfections, Lying Down and Courage.

She is currently on her Courage world tour, which launched in Quebec City on Sept. 18.

Her tour is her first in over a decade after she closed out her Celine residency in Las Vegas back in June after over eight years.
description: Celine Dion wished two of her sons a happy birthday on Wednesday, in a rare family snap shared to Instagram.
